issue.title: How to Use plugins in SDF or convert SDF to URDF?

content.raw:
You asked a couple of different questions there, let me answer them separately:

1. If you're trying to use Gazebo plugins, they work within both [SDF](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=plugins_hello_world&cat=write_plugin) and [URDF](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=ros_gzplugins).

1. For converting SDF to URDF, see [this issue](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/1482/sdf-to-urdf-convertor).

Also, please direct questions like this to [Gazebo Answers](http://answers.gazebosim.org/questions/) in the future. The issue tracker is for bug reports and feature requests ;)
content.html:
You asked a couple of different questions there, let me answer them separately:

  1. If you're trying to use Gazebo plugins, they work within both SDF and URDF.

  2. For converting SDF to URDF, see this issue.

Also, please direct questions like this to Gazebo Answers in the future. The issue tracker is for bug reports and feature requests ;)
